definition: an agreement between parties, usually arrived at after discussion, fixing obligations of each, to come to terms
details:
noun
- an agreement between parties, usually arrived at after discussion, fixing obligations of each
= example: an agreement between parties, usually arrived at after discussion, fixing obligations of each
= synonyms: deal
- an advantageous purchase
= example: an advantageous purchase
= synonyms: steal
verb
- to come to terms
= example: to come to terms
= synonyms: settle
- to negotiate the terms of an exchange
= example: to negotiate the terms of an exchange
= synonyms: dicker
